discussiontools-autotopicsubpopup-body: {{GENDER:|fʋ}} na paam tiɛnr labaar saŋa kanɛ ka sɔ' zaŋ labapaal niŋ sɔnsʋg kaŋa ni. Fʋ tʋn'e maali fʋ tiɛnr labaar la zi'esim fʋ bɔɔdim pʋʋgin
discussiontoolsdebug-intro:
Zug lakir nwa pan'andnɛ [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Extension:DiscussionTools DiscussionTools extension]
la n baŋid pʋte'enra nɛ lɛbisa tisid zug lakir la ni '''[[:$1]]'''. Fʋ tɔn'ɛ nyee li sʋŋir yisibin yɛla nɛ tɔ'ɔŋir la bɛɛ gba'adi li gbin lin tʋm si'em. Laba kan na nɔɔ n bɛ [[$2|discussiontoolspageinfo API]] la ni.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc: [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-talkpages}}|Sɔnsig lakirin la]] anɛ zin'ikanɛ ka ti na ka nwɛ' taaba saawara ka li sʋŋ ka ti sɔb la  {{SITENAME}} an sʋ'ʋm wʋʋ din nar si'em la. Fʋ tun'e dɔlis lakirin nwa sɔns nɛ fʋ taaba yanamɛ na niŋ si'em ka ya sɔb la an sʋ'ʋŋa [[:{{SUBJECTPAGENAME}}]].
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-self:
Nidib banɛ bɛ {{SITENAME}} tɔn'ɛ tʋm nɛ' [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage}}|talk page]] n 
kpɛn'ɛs labaar la paalʋ {{GENDER:|you}}, ka fʋ na paam ti'enr ba ya'a maal.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-self-ano:
Ninbanɛ bɛ {{SITENAME}} tʋn'e zaŋ nɛ' tʋm[[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage-anon}}|talk page]] n zaŋ nidib labaar Kat wa'ae nɛ dɛmisʋg kanɛ maal yi IP adɛrɛsin la{{GENDER:| fʋ}} mɔri tʋm nannnana la.
Bɛdegʋ IP adɛrɛsnam tiakir nɛ saŋa wʋsa, ka nidib bɛdegʋ pʋdigidi li saŋa wʋsa. Fʋ tʋn'e [$1 maal akaʋnt ]bɛɛ[$2 kpɛn' ] ti gu' bɛog tuluŋ nɛ tʋmtʋm banɛ yiisi ba mɛŋ. Amaal akaʋnt mɛ sʋŋid su'adi fʋ IP adɛrɛs.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-user: [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage}}|Talk pages]] anɛ zin'ig kanɛ ka nidib sɔsidi ken ban na niŋ siem maal yɛlzugi {{SITENAME}}  li sʋ'ʋŋa kan ka li na an. Pin'ilim sɔsʋg paali n tɔɔŋid ka la'as {{GENDER:{{PAGENAME}}|with}} [[:{{SUBJECTPAGENAME}}|{{PAGENAME}}]]. Bɔ  {{GENDER:|you}} yɛl kpala na bɛ paalʋ ka sieba n ye.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-user-ano: [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage-anon}}|Talk pages]] anɛ zin'ig kanɛ ka nidib sɔsidi gba'ad ban na niŋ si'em maal yɛlzugi bɛ {{SITENAME}} li sʋ'ʋm ka li na nyaŋi bɛ. Tʋmnɛ lakir nwa n pin'il nɛ sɔsʋg zaŋi ken dɛmisa banɛ maali nyi IP zin'ig nwa. Bɔ ka {{GENDER:|you}} yɛl ye kpala na bɛ paalʋ ka sieba n ye. IP zin'ig bɛdegʋ tiakid nɛ, ka nidib bɛdegʋ ɛɛti pʋdigidi ba.
discussiontools-emptystate-title-self: Pʋ'ʋsim tisidif fʋ pian'ʋk lakir zin'ig
discussiontools-emptystate-title-self-an: Bɔ'ɔdif ken-ken sɔnsʋg lakir kaŋa ni
discussiontools-error-comment-conflict: {{GENDER:|your}} lɛbisʋg la pʋ nyaŋi ziennɛ, bɔzugɔ sɔ' mɛn lɛbis ya fʋ saŋa la mɛn nɔɔ. Maalim suguru kpɛ'ɛŋim ya'as bɛɛ maligim vɛ'ɛg lakir la n gɔs nananna lɛbisa.
discussiontools-error-comment-disappeare: Pʋ nyaŋi nye lɛbisʋg la {{GENDER:|you're}} lɛbisid lakir la nii. Li tɔn'ɛ saae bɛɛ tɔlisi keŋ lakir sia ni.
Bɛllimnɛ maligim din'lɛm maki gɔs la
discussiontools-error-comment-is-transcl: "{{int:discussiontools-replylink}}" la, nwiig kʋ nyaŋi tʋmi an lɛbisʋgi tis lɛbisʋg nwa. Fʋ ya'a ye fʋ lɛbisɛ, maalim suguru  {{GENDER:|use}} lakir la wusa dɛmisʋg diim "$1".
"{{int:discussiontools-replylink}}" la, nwiig kʋ nyaŋi nɔki lɛbis lɔk lɛbisʋg nwa bɔzugɔ li vɛ'ɛgidnɛ yit lakir ayinne ni na. Fʋ ya'a ye fʋ lɛbisɛ, maalim suguru {{GENDER:|go}} kpala: [[$1]].
discussiontools-error-comment-not-saved: {{GENDER:|your}} lɛbisʋg pʋ nyaŋi niŋ paalʋ tis nananna lakir ziesim. Fʋ ya'a bɔɔd ye nananna tiasa, gbɛ'ɛmi fʋ lɛbisʋg gʋlʋsʋg ka yʋn tʋm nɛ fʋ sinlinsipaanliŋ la vɛɛg lakir la.
discussiontools-error-lint: Pian'ad lɛbisʋg lakir nwa ni kʋ nye lɛbisʋgɔ ka li anɛ gbɛliŋi bɛ wikitext ni. {{GENDER:|You}} tɔn'ɛ zamisi zaŋi ken gbɛliŋ kanɛ nyi [$1 reading the documentation], ieɛm sʋŋiri nyi [$2 posting here] bɛɛ maalim gbɛliŋ la nyi [$3 opening the full page editor].
discussiontools-error-noswitchtove: Gafar, tiaki keŋ gɔtiŋin ziesim pʋ tʋmma bɔzugɔ $1 daa paam ni'eri nyi lɛbisʋg {{GENDER:|you}} have written. [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:DiscussionTools/Reply_tool_visual_mode_limitations Learn more].
discussiontools-findcomment-results-id: lɛbisʋg nɛ li ID la ni'eya dɔlisʋg {{PLURAL:$1|page|pages}} la ni.
discussiontools-findcomment-results-name: lɛbisʋg nɛ li yʋ'ʋr tisib ni'eya dɔlisʋg {{PLURAL:$1|zug lakir|pages}}: la ni.
discussiontools-findcomment-gotocomment: Ka li ya'a niesi yi nananna lakir zamisʋg ti'enr yinne, {{GENDER:|you}} na n [[Special:GoToComment/$1|go directly to the comment using this link]]. Nɛɛ li na maligi zii fʋ keŋ vɛɛsa yiib.
discussiontools-ledesection-button: Zamisim pamm zaŋi kin zug lakir nwa.
discussiontools-limitreport-errorreqid: Sɔsʋg la'ad nam gbeligir bu'os ID
discussiontools-newtopic-missing-title: M bɛlim nɛ, bɔɔm yʋ'ʋri tis   {{GENDER:|your}} sɔsʋg pian'azug. Fʋ ya'a n di' "{{int:discussiontools-replywidget-newtopic}}",fʋ pian'azug na paas ka yʋ'ʋr pʋ paasɛ.
discussiontools-newtopicssubscription-bu: Yisimi fʋ mɛŋ ka da paam tɛn'ɛsa yɛlzud paal ya'a pin'il zug lakir kaŋa ni.
Yisimi fʋ mɛŋ ka da paam tɛn'ɛsa yɛlzud paalʋg ya'a pin'il zug lakir kaŋa ni.
discussiontools-newtopicssubscription-no: {{GENDER:|Fʋ}} na paam tɛn'ɛsa yɛlzud paalug ya'a pin'il zug lakir nwa ni.
{{GENDER:|Fʋ}} kʋ lɛm paam tɛn'ɛsa yɛlzud paal ya'a pin'il zug lakir nwa ni.
discussiontools-notification-added-topic: {{PLURAL:$1|Yɛlzug paal yinne|$1 yɛlzud paal|100=99+ new topics}} on "$2".
discussiontools-notification-removed-top: {{GENDER:|Fʋ}} tɔn'ɛ pʋ lɛm paam tɛn'sa zaŋi ken {{PLURAL:$1|yɛlzug nwa|yɛlzud bama}}.
{{PLURAL:$1|yɛlzug yinne da anɛ|$1 yɛlzut daa anɛ|100=99+ topics were}} su'a bɛɛ isidi nyi $2.
Basim di'esid tɛn'ɛsa wʋʋ nwa nɛ
{{GENDER:|You}} kʋ lɛm di'e tɛn'ɛsa yɛlzug ya'a sʋ'a bɛɛ yis.
discussiontools-notification-subscribed-: {{PLURAL:$1|One new reply|$1 new replies|100=99+ new replies}} bɛ "$3" ni.
discussiontools-pageframe-latestcomment: Lɛbisʋg paal: $1 ka $2 niŋ yɛlzug ni $3
discussiontools-permalink-comment-copied: Tɔɔŋim keŋ lɛbisʋg pʋdigi niŋ sɔb zin'ig.
discussiontools-preference-autotopicsub: Siaki kpe' yɛlzutin la ba mɛŋ
discussiontools-preference-autotopicsub-: {{GENDER:|you}} ya'a pin'il sɔnsʋg paal bɛɛ lɛbisʋg linɛ bɛ sɔnsʋg kanɛ pʋn bɛ, fʋ na nyi ti'enr yim sieba ya'a tut lɛbisa paala li ni.
discussiontools-preference-description:
Tisim suori tis lakir pian'ad ziesa tʋʋma:
* [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Talk_pages_project/Usability Show metadata] zaŋi ken sɔnsʋg yinne wusa ka tis lakir paal ziesim.

Fʋ tɔn'ɛ zi'eli fʋ ziesa ni [[Special:Preferences#mw-prefsection-editing-discussion|preferences]].

Labaar na niŋ paalʋ la [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Talk_pages_project/Updates talk pages project's updates page].

Mɔr nɛ ti'ir, maalim suguru:
* saŋaa, ziesa tʋʋma paal na paas.
* ziesa sieba banɛ bɛɛ agɔl la tɔn'ɛ pʋ bɛɛ fʋ wiki la ni nannɛ.
discussiontools-preference-gadget-confli: Fʋ ya'a bɔɔd ye suor bɛ tis tɔ'tɔ lɛbisʋgɔ, yiiga fʋ nar ye fʋ [[$1|disable the Convenient Discussions gadget]] fʋ la'ad bɔɔdim nam ni.
discussiontools-preference-newtopictool: Basim suori tis tɔ'tɔ yɛlzug paasʋg
discussiontools-preference-newtopictool-: M ya.a kaae sɔsʋg lakir linɛ ka ba nan pʋ ya'abɛ:
Nwa na bigisif paalʋ suorin tis yɛlzug paal paasʋg,
discussiontools-preference-replytool-hel: Nwa na bigisif nwiig ka fʋ lɛbis pian'ad lakir lɛbisa si'isʋg yinne ni.
discussiontools-preference-sourcemodetoo: Basim suori tis dɛmisʋg la'ad ziesim yiib ni
Nwa na paas 'toolbar' tis tɔ'tɔ lɛbisʋg la nɛ tɔ'tɔ yɛlzug ziesa nam paasʋg suor ziesa banɛ mɔr suo-gima tis 'pinging' ka paasid nwiis.
discussiontools-preference-summary: Fʋ tɔn'ɛ zamisi zaŋi keŋ ziesa bama dɔl nɛ karimig la [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Talk_pages_project/Feature_summary feature summary].
discussiontools-preference-topicsubscrip: Nwa na tisif suor ka fʋ si'aki kpe' ye fʋ di'e tɛn'ɛsa zaŋi keŋ lɛbisa zaŋi keŋ nidid wusa yɛlzutin.
discussiontools-preference-visualenhance: Nwa na sʋŋ lakir pian'ad paal nɛɛnsim linɛ na paas labaar zaŋi tʋʋma sɔnsʋg wusa pʋʋgin
discussiontools-replywidget-abandon: Fʋ {{GENDER:|you}} tis sida ye fʋ bɔɔd ye fʋ bas lɛbisʋg la ka fʋ gʋlisid la?
discussiontools-replywidget-abandontopic: Fʋ {{GENDER:|you}} tis sida ye fʋ bɔɔd ye fʋ bas yɛlzug la ka fʋ gʋlisid la?
discussiontools-replywidget-anon-warning: fʋ pʋ n yɔɔgɛ. Ye fʋ nye' tɛ'ɛnsʋg sɔ ya'a lɛbis ka di'e 'attribution' nɛ fʋ yʋ'ʋr ka ka'a fu IP zin'is la, fʋ tɔn'ɛ [$1 log in] bɛɛ [$2 create an account].
discussiontools-replywidget-keyboard-sho: Fʋ tɔn'ɛ n din' $1 n tisi fʋ lɛbisʋ
discussiontools-replywidget-signature-bo: $1 n tiaknɛ lieb {{GENDER:|your}} tikir. A zan'as nɛ, sɔm $2. Baŋim ye fʋ pʋ nar ye fʋ tik lɛbisa nɛ la'ʋk nwa. Fʋ tikir la na paasi li mɛŋ.
discussiontools-replywidget-terms-click: Fʋ ya'a n si'is "$1", {{GENDER:|you}} siak ya wiki nwa wada nam.
discussiontools-replywidget-transcluded: Fʋ lɛbisʋg na kpe' si'eni bɛ [[$1]].
discussiontools-target-comment-missing: Pʋ nye lɛbisʋg nwaa. Li tɔn'ɛ n saae bɛɛ tɔɔm zin'ig.
discussiontools-target-comments-missing: Pʋ nye lɛbisʋg paalɛ. Ba tɔn'ɛ saae bɛɛ tɔɔm zin'ig.
discussiontools-topicsubscription-action: Siaki kpe' zaŋi keŋ lakir yɛlzut paalʋg nwa tɛn'ɛsa?
Ye fʋ yisimi fʋ mɛŋi nyi yɛlzug nwa nii?
Yisi fʋ mɛŋi kpe' zaŋi keŋ lakir yɛlzut paalʋg nwa tɛn'ɛsa?
discussiontools-topicsubscription-button: {{GENDER:|Subscribe}} nye tɛn'ɛssa zaŋi ken lɛbisa paala ni.
{{GENDER:|Unsubscribe}} ka da paamid tɛn'ɛsa zaŋi lɛbisa paalʋgɔ
discussiontools-topicsubscription-error-: Sakir kpe' la n zieni tis 'URL' la pʋ bɛɛ.
discussiontools-topicsubscription-notify: Fʋ na nyɛ labaya banɛ ka nidib lɛbisi zaŋi ken pian'azug kaŋa nwa.
Fʋ kʋ lɛn nyɛ labaya yit nidibi lɛbisid si'em zaŋi ken pian'azug nwa nii.
discussiontools-topicsubscription-specia:
Suor bɛ tis asiaki kpe' {{GENDER:|you}} n dɔl yɛlzug pian'ad lakir nam. Sɔ ya'a lɛbisi yɛlzug la, fʋ na paam ti'enr. 

Yaligim fʋn bɔɔd siem nɛ zin'ig kanɛ ka fʋ na paam tɛn'ɛsa bama bɛ [[Special:Preferences#mw-prefsection-echo|your preferences]].
echo-pref-tooltip-dt-subscription: Ti'emim sɔ ya'a tut lɛbisʋg paal yɛlzug kanɛ ka m bɛɛ li pʋʋgin {{GENDER:|subscribed}} to.
echo-pref-tooltip-dt-subscription-archiv: Ti'emim yɛlzug kanɛ ka m {{GENDER:|subscribed}} tis la su'a nɛ bɛɛ yisnɛ nyi lakir la, bɛɛ tɛn'ɛsa zaŋi ken lɛbisa paala banɛ ka ba tut yɛlzug kan la ya'a kʋ nyaŋi an linɛ na tis yɛla sieba.
discussiontools-comments-before-first-he: Lakir sɔnsʋg la mɔr lɛbisa bɛ 'lede' ziesimin la (yiiga ka nyaan tis yɛltis). Nɛ tɔn'ɛ ta'as ka 'lede' la bɛɛ lɛbisa la n ti pʋ nie sʋ'ʋŋa, li kas-kas mɔbaal la ziesim nɛ mɔbaal dʋk namin.
tag-discussiontools-added-comment-descri: Lakir pian'ad lɛbisʋg paas ya dɛmisʋg nwa ni
tag-discussiontools-description: Maal dɛmisʋg tʋm nɛ sɔsʋg la'ad
tag-discussiontools-edit-description: Tʋm-tʋm dɛmisid lɛbisʋg kanɛ pʋn dɛŋi bɛ nɛ sɔsʋg la'ad
tag-discussiontools-newtopic-description: Tʋm-tʋm paas yɛlzug paali niŋ lakir la ni nɛ sɔsʋg la'ad
tag-discussiontools-reply-description: Tʋm-tʋm lɛbis ya tis lɛbisʋg nɛ sɔsʋg la'ad
tag-discussiontools-source-description: Sɔsʋg la'ad bɛɛn ziesim yiib zin'igin
tag-discussiontools-source-enhanced-desc: Sɔsʋg la'ad bɛɛn tiensʋg yiib zin'ig ziesim nɛ 'toolbar' la
tag-discussiontools-visual-description: Sɔsʋg la'ad paa bɛɛn nɛ gɔtiŋin ziesim
